name: Calambity (Lmcfall)
description:
Main Playable Character: A Collie Dog

Genre: Farming Comedy

Type: 3D Casual Rapid Simulation

Themes: Funny, Family Friendly

Players: Single Player

Target Audience: Children to Young Adults, ESRB ‘E’

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Summary: You play as a Sheep Dog. Your task - Herd as many sheep as possible within the time!  

Why Play it?: It has a comedic heart like ‘Untitled Goose Game’ but quick fire rounds with replay-ability like ‘Overcooked’.

Key Game feature:
There are ‘power-ups’ which can either help, hinder, or simply provide a giggle in your gameplay.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

  • WASD - Movement
  • Spacebar - Jump
  • Shift - Sprint
  • Left Click - Bark
  • Right Click - Change Camera 

To Herd the Sheep: If you move towards the sheep, they will naturally move away from you. But bark at them and they will run away! 

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

To Play: Download the zip, and once unzipped click on 'Calambity' executable with the sheep logo.
